name: AMC Networks Inc.
goal: AMC Networks International ("AMCNI"), the non-US / Canada domestic division of AMC Networks, delivers entertaining and acclaimed programming that reaches subscribers in more than 140 countries and territories, including countries and territories in Europe, Latin America, the Middle East and parts of Asia and Africa. AMC Networks International consists of global brands, Sundance Channel and AMC, as well as popular, locally recognized channels in various programming genres.
interests: Business and Industry, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Research and innovation, Single market, Sport
euInitiatives: Initiatives to be adopted under the Digital Single Market strategy and other EU law; Brexit issues.
